Christopher Schmitt

Christopher Schmitt is an award-winning designer and author of several books on web and graphic design. He is a popular international speaker with more than two decades of experience in web design, yet endlessly curious and a relentless tinkerer. Christopher looks for ways to help educate and empower people about web publishing and Internet culture.
